channel.description: Recent content in gaming on probes

item.title: Factober 5400
item.author: sszynrae@gmail.com (clux)
item.description: Round two of escapism this year. This is a post for myself with various information as a conclusion to my recent fixation into designing an efficient and compact factorio megabase.

item.title: Baldur's Gate: Multinomial Edition
item.author: sszynrae@gmail.com (clux)
item.description:
In a brief bout of escapism from the world and responsibilities, I booted up Baldur’s Gate 2 with my brother. It’s an amazing game, once you have figured out how to roll your character.

For today’s installment; rather than telling you about the game, let’s talk about the maths behind rolling a 2e character for BG2, and then running simulations with weird X-based linux tools.

item.title: Vault of Therayne
item.author: sszynrae@gmail.com (clux)
item.description: An easter egg for the Dungeon Siege 2 Broken World expansion.
